en.title: Official Appointment
en.content:
FusionExcel is pleased to announce the official appointment of International Badminton Champion, Foo Kok Keong, as FusionExcel International Sports Advisor for our amazing Quantum Pendant. Foo Kok Keong's personal experiences and endorsement of FE's Quantum Pendant will take FusionExcel to the next level of growth. Welcome, Foo Kok Keong!
 
Click Here to Read Foo Kok Keong's Testimonial

meta.description: FusionExcel is pleased to announce the official appointment of International Badminton Champion, Foo Kok Keong, as FusionExcel International Sports Advisor for our amazing Quantum Pendant. Foo Kok Keong's personal experiences and endorsement of FE's Quantum Pendant will take FusionExcel to the next level of growth. Welcome, Foo Kok Keong!
meta.author: klhunter

bm.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearer, Muay Thai Boxing Champion Narunat!

meta.description: FE is proud to present FE's Quantum Pendant to Muay Thai Boxing Champion Narunat after his knock-out win in front of 4,000 audience in Bangkok recently. Presenting the Quantum Pendant was FE's Thai Country Licensee, Don Chan. The fight was broadcast live to 20 million viewers on Thailand's popular Channel 7.
meta.keyword: FE Welcomes QP Wearer, Muay Thai Boxing Champion Narunat!
meta.author: klhunter
